Sentence.string: Could you analyze this blood sample for me ?
It would be a great pleasure but I need to know what to find...
I found toxic plants. Could you look for some traces in the blood sample ?
Of course. I’ve got all what I need. Wait a minute. I’ll tell you when I’m done.

You were right. I found small quantities of hemlock in the blood. But it’s strange. This poison should cause strong muscle contractions, particularly on the face. Did you see such a thing on the corpse ?
I should speak to Wallace. Thank you Will !
